content.description: As part of a survey, <math alttext="118" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>118</mn></mrow></mstyle></math> adults with tattoos were asked whether they got their first tattoo before reaching the age of <math alttext="25" overflow="scroll"><mn>25</mn></math> and whether their first tattoo was done by a professional tattoo artist. The resulting data are summarized in the following table.
content.question: Before the Age of <math alttext="25" overflow="scroll"><mn>25</mn></math> <math alttext="25" overflow="scroll"><mn>25</mn></math> or Older Total Professional tattoo artist <math alttext="10" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>10</mn></mrow></mstyle></math> <math alttext="87" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>87</mn></mrow></mstyle></math> <math alttext="97" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.4em"></mspace><mn>97</mn></mrow></mstyle></math> Not a professional tattoo artist <math alttext="9" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.4em"></mspace><mn>9</mn></mrow></mstyle></math> <math alttext="12" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>12</mn></mrow></mstyle></math> <math alttext="21" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.4em"></mspace><mn>21</mn></mrow></mstyle></math> Total <math alttext="19" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>19</mn></mrow></mstyle></math> <math alttext="99" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>99</mn></mrow></mstyle></math> <math alttext="118" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>118</mn></mrow></mstyle></math> Which of the following provides evidence that age at first tattoo and whether the first tattoo was done by a professional tattoo artist are not independent for the group of <math alttext="118" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>118</mn></mrow></mstyle></math> adults with tattoos?

choices.label: <math alttext="the fraction 10 over 97 is not equal to the fraction 87 over 97" overflow="scroll"> <mstyle> <mrow> <mfrac> <mrow> <mn>10</mn> </mrow> <mrow> <mn>97</mn> </mrow> </mfrac> <mo>≠</mo> <mfrac> <mrow> <mn>87</mn> </mrow> <mrow> <mn>97</mn> </mrow> </mfrac> </mrow> </mstyle> </math>

<math alttext="the fraction 10 over 97 is not equal to the fraction 19 over 118" overflow="scroll"> <mstyle> <mrow> <mfrac> <mrow> <mn>10</mn> </mrow> <mrow> <mn>97</mn> </mrow> </mfrac> <mo>≠</mo> <mfrac> <mrow> <mn>19</mn> </mrow> <mrow> <mn>118</mn> </mrow> </mfrac> </mrow> </mstyle> </math>

<math alttext="the fraction 10 over 19 is not equal to the fraction 10 over 97" overflow="scroll"> <mstyle> <mrow> <mfrac> <mrow> <mn>10</mn> </mrow> <mrow> <mn>19</mn> </mrow> </mfrac> <mo>≠</mo> <mfrac> <mrow> <mn>10</mn> </mrow> <mrow> <mn>97</mn> </mrow> </mfrac> </mrow> </mstyle> </math>

<math alttext="the fraction 19 over 118 is not equal to the fraction 99 over 118" overflow="scroll"> <mstyle> <mrow> <mfrac> <mrow> <mn>19</mn> </mrow> <mrow> <mn>118</mn> </mrow> </mfrac> <mo>≠</mo> <mfrac> <mrow> <mn>99</mn> </mrow> <mrow> <mn>118</mn> </mrow> </mfrac> </mrow> </mstyle> </math>

<math alttext="the fraction 97 over 118 is not equal to the fraction 21 over 118" overflow="scroll"> <mstyle> <mrow> <mfrac> <mrow> <mn>97</mn> </mrow> <mrow> <mn>118</mn> </mrow> </mfrac> <mo>≠</mo> <mfrac> <mrow> <mn>21</mn> </mrow> <mrow> <mn>118</mn> </mrow> </mfrac> </mrow> </mstyle> </math>

content.answer: <math alttext="the fraction 10 over 97 is not equal to the fraction 19 over 118" overflow="scroll"> <mstyle> <mrow> <mfrac> <mrow> <mn>10</mn> </mrow> <mrow> <mn>97</mn> </mrow> </mfrac> <mo>≠</mo> <mfrac> <mrow> <mn>19</mn> </mrow> <mrow> <mn>118</mn> </mrow> </mfrac> </mrow> </mstyle> </math>

skill.text: Skill 2.D: Compare distributions or relative positions of points within a distribution.
